[[=]]
Welcome to the **SCP ORIGINS** hub, where tales of various SCP’s origins are finally told!

View it as a //collaborative anthology// series with there being no through-line in terms of story & characters.[[footnote]] Though consistent characters & storyline are not barred //(see below)//. [[/footnote]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

------

**Q:** How do I post my articles?

**A:** If you’ve got a finished tale post a link to the sandbox in the discussion thread, DM or contact me on Discord! //(Username: Springcrap.)// However you’d prefer!

I’ll then read through it and add it to the hub page; note that I won’t be criticizing your draft, nor not add it just because I don’t like it. May sound more tedious than it actually is; I just want to read what other people have put together for this hub, is all!
@@ @@
[[=]]
*
[[/=]]
@@ @@
**Q:** Does it need to be an anthology?

**A:** NOPE! If you want to create multiple tales with consistent characters & a storyline, feel free to create them!

If you want to use characters from tales I and/or others have created, or even make sequels to existing tales, feel free to do so! Said articles must be send to me as outlined above.

------

[[=]]
**Thank you so much for reading!**
